output.desc:
HTML output path
Default is the input with an .html extension

styles.desc: CSS paths that will be referenced

copiedStyles.desc: CSS file paths that will be copied over

plugins.desc: Plugins to use separated by a space

xhtmlOut.desc:
Use '/' to close single tags (
). This is only for full CommonMark compatibility

langPrefix.desc: CSS language prefix for fenced blocks. Can be useful for external highlighters

quotes.desc: Double + single quotes replacement pairs, when typographer enabled, and smartquotes on

failOnWarn.desc: Stops the program when encaunters a warning

comment.desc: Adds a comment in the HTML with the command called.

force.desc: Doesn't emit a warning before overriding a file

title.desc: What to write in the HTML <title> tag

inlineStyle.desc: A piece of css to write in a <style> tag
